item.headline: Conversaciones creadoras: Mastering Spanish Conversation
item.description: Conversaciones creadoras: Mastering Spanish Conversation implements a dynamic, learner-centered approach that encourages students to use Spanish to resolve meaningful and emotionally charged conflicts. A carefully crafted pedagogical apparatus featuring Conversaciones creadora mini-dramas, written by renowned Spanish novelist Carmen Martín Gaite, challenges students to become active participants in the learning process. - See more at: http://bit.ly/1JfaDr7

item.headline: SAM - Instructors - Drop Box
item.description: This training video walks you through downloading and viewing student files with the SAM Drop Box, and how to disable student access to the Drop Box. For more information visit: www.cengage.com/dcs.

item.headline: Raising the Bar in Developmental Education: Helping Students Exceed Their Own Expectations
item.description: Agile Persons that are part of the gale things

item.headline: Engaging Learners in Computing Skills for the Future
item.description: Cengage Learning Course Technology author Corinne Hoisington discusses how she creates materials for learners that offer a visual, multimedia approach. She talks about the engaging, step-by-step narrative that is accompanied by visual cues and often video allowing learners to see and understand, rather than just read about, concepts.

item.headline: Business MindTap – Chapter 3
item.description: Cengage Learning's MindTap is the digital learning solution that helps instructors transform today’s students into critical thinkers. www.cengage.com/mindtap
